proposed model.from sentence: We apply the proposed model to aspect - level sentiment classification .

our experiments.from sentence: In our experiments , all word vectors are initialized by Glove 1 .

word embedding vectors.from sentence: The word embedding vectors are pre-trained on an unlabeled corpus whose size is about 840 billion .

other parameters.from sentence: The other parameters are initialized by sampling from a uniform distribution U (?? , ? ) .

dimension.from sentence: The dimension of word vectors , aspect embeddings and the size of hidden layer are 300 .

length.from sentence: The length of attention weights is the same as the length of sentence .

Theano.from sentence: Theano is used for implementing our neural network models .

trained.from sentence: We trained all models with a batch size of 25 examples , and a momentum of 0.9 , L 2 - regularization weight of 0.001 and initial learning rate of 0.01 for AdaGrad .
